title: Scaffolding (6U73)
text:
Set:	Ents of Fangorn
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Isengard
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Possession
Game Text:	Plays to your support area. Each time a regroup action discards an [Isengard] Orc, you may stack that Orc on this card. Response: If an [Isengard] Orc is about to take a wound, discard 2 cards stacked here to prevent that wound.
Lore:	Towers marked the inner ring, implements of industry.
Rarity:	U
